Package manager

Class MapEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • manager.MapEncoder
  • public class MapEncoder
extends java.lang.Object
    Maps are represented as text files, running a run length encode on a map will save memory (e.g. important on old games consoles). This class allows for run length encoding of maps and also decoding.
    Author:
    psyfb2

        public static java.lang.String RunLengthEncodeLine​(java.lang.String line)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        String String corresponding to Run Length Encoded input line

      • isEncoded

        public static boolean isEncoded​(java.lang.String fileName)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Checks whether a text file is in the encoded form for Run Length Encoding. Useful to check whether a text file is encoded, if not then encode it
        Parameters:
        fileName - File name of the file
        Returns:
        True if it is encoded, else false
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - File name not found

      • isEncodedLine

        public static boolean isEncodedLine​(java.lang.String line)
        Checks whether a String is encoded using Run length Encoded
        Parameters:
        line - String to check
        Returns:
        True if it is encoded, else false
